metadata.title: CVE-2024-23835 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Suricata is a network Intrusion Detection System, Intrusion PreventionSystem and Network Security Monitoring engine. Prior to version 7.0.3,excessive memory use during pgsql parsing could lead to OOM-relatedcrashes. This vulnerability is patched in 7.0.3. As workaround, users candisable the pgsql app layer parser.

criterions.comment: suricata package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
